content.query:
-- Storage path where the result set will persist
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'adlsnycpayroll-eric-p_adlsnycpayroll-eric-p_dfs_core_windows_net') 
    CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [adlsnycpayroll-eric-p_adlsnycpayroll-eric-p_dfs_core_windows_net] 
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'abfss://adlsnycpayroll-eric-p@adlsnycpayroll-eric-p.dfs.core.windows.net' 
    )
GO
